item.title: Base usefull commands
item.author: me@vpopov.org (Vadym Popov)
item.description: Docker Mount portworx volume to the empty container docker run -it --rm --volume-driver pxd -v name=hublndstaging:/data alpine sh Unix Filesystem Remove files that is older than 7 days with specified file mask find /data/ -mtime +7 -name "*.gz" -exec rm {} \; Git base workflow Push updatest from one remote repository to another, very helpful in case of work with github forked repositories git push vp origin/master:refs/heads/master Counting objects: 9, done.
